thing-type.label: 914TRLv3 Touchpad Electronic Deadbolt
thing-type.description: Touchpad Electronic Deadbolt<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtOne touch locking</li&gt <li&gtDramatically reduced, all-metal interior </li&gt <li&gt30 user codes plus master code </li&gt <li&gtBHMA grade 2 certified </li&gt <li&gt20 minute fire rating - UL certified </li&gt <li&gtFull 128-bit encryption security </li&gt <li&gtSmartKey: Re-key the lock in seconds</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress button “A” on the lock one time to include it in your system.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress button “A” on the lock one time to exclude it from your system.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtN/A</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: User Code 1 Type
parameter.description: User Code 1 Type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<table&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gtParameter Value</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gt<strong&gtDescription</strong&gt</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0x00</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtReserved </td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0x01</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtOwner (Default)</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0x02</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtReserved</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0x03</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtGuest (required for Year/Day schedules)</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0x04</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtWorker (required for week day schedules)</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0x05 - 0xFE</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtReserved </td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gt0xFF</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gtNo User Code assigned </td&gt </tr&gt</table&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_40_1_wo
parameter.label: 40: Factory Reset
parameter.description: Have lock perform factory reset. (1 will reset)

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe lock supports 2 association groups. Per Z-Wave Plus requirements, group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline group and can only support 1 node.</p&gt <p&gtThe Lifeline group supports the following unsolicited messages:</p&gt <table&gt<tr&gt<td&gt<strong&gtCommand Class</strong&gt</td&gt <td&gt<strong&gtCommand</strong&gt</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtCommand Class Battery</td&gt <td&gtBattery Report</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtCommand Class Door Lock </td&gt <td&gtDoor Lock Operation Report</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtCommand Class Notification</td&gt <td&gtNotification Report</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtCommand Class Device Reset Locally </td&gt <td&gt <p&gtDevice Reset Locally Notification</p&gt </td&gt </tr&gt</table&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Doorlock notify report
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWill provide all Notification Reports, via the Command Class Notification, generated by the lock.</p&gt
